description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ced5u","text":"Protocol developed by the Antimicrobial Group class project. The goal was to isolate microbes from freshwater lakes that produce antimicrobial compounds in order to study antibiotic production in nature and environmental reservoirs of antibiotic resistance.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehgdo","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b983i","text":"Protocol for class project in Microbes in the Wild: Advanced Environmental Microbiology Lab (EEB 447) course at University of Michigan Biological Station and on campus. \n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":72}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bobdt","text":"Collect whole water at six sites using a Van Dorn water collector for deep (~122.5-123.7 m) samples  and 2 L containers for surface samples (~15 cm below the surface). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54n1e","text":"Set site names and classifications","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ennum","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fds78","text":"3. Prefilter whole water using 20μm mesh. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhk6r","text":"4. Set up peristaltic pump with 3 µm filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6edh6","text":"5. Filter approximately 500mL of sample water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38ldj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bgr2n","text":"6. Collect the filter in an eppendorf with 1mL of PBS as the particle-associated large fragment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"162CF9B220C011EE89310A58A9FEAC02","height":null,"id":"33306","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"8d1if\",\"text\":\"Sites samples and description\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":[]}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"sampleing sites.PNG","placeholder":"","source":"https://content.protocols.io/bas4a.png","width":671}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ilrm","text":"Collect the \u003c3μm filtered water as the free-living (FL) smaller fraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7gl95","text":"For the particle-associated (PA) fraction, vortex tube, then partially remove filter with an edge under the closed cap","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ognq","text":"Pipette 10μL of both PA and FL onto separate plates of 4 agar types (TSA, LB, BG11, and LAKE) and spread.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kd20","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hje8","text":"This is the parent generation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aa4vh","text":"From the lawns initially plated, by sterile loop pick up a single colony.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1leo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brihk","text":"Steak for isolation using a three phase streak pattern as shown below, sterilizing the loop in between each quadrant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dlk6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fd67","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cd7uk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hcp6","text":"4. Label these plates \"generation 1\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":35}],"data":{}},{"key":"90ra6","text":"5. Continue until generation 3 is obtained.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7o38r","text":"6. Use generation 3 for testing.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"diglq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qe4e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffddb","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"l3tu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6i1k1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e69un","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbjcq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ergsb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dr535","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"64FDF00C20C011EE89310A58A9FEAC02","height":null,"id":"33315","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"2hun4\",\"text\":\"\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/batea.png","source":"https://content.protocols.io/batda.png","width":645}},"1":{"type":"imageblock","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"64FDF0E520C011EE89310A58A9FEAC02","height":"184px;","id":"33315","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":null,"original_name":null,"placeholder":"https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/jorqd0OQvYlUMYBBHFqhD2DXlRFnjlATuVbeLnyqUmUNs-S4DK-vMbLENUCa-I7anMtoTsr2seKcWQQdS68OvMWxydtnlNE-RKfV-dRGKGD-S0zGBHi-RdpIEiOh-_DHmHyVme1leyI","source":"https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/jorqd0OQvYlUMYBBHFqhD2DXlRFnjlATuVbeLnyqUmUNs-S4DK-vMbLENUCa-I7anMtoTsr2seKcWQQdS68OvMWxydtnlNE-RKfV-dRGKGD-S0zGBHi-RdpIEiOh-_DHmHyVme1leyI","width":"339px;"}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"64FDEF8D20C011EE89310A58A9FEAC02","height":null,"id":"33312","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"le
